description: This file defines an immutable Dart class named 'Product' used to model product or inventory item data in a beverage distribution management system. It includes fields for id, name, sku, stock, and unitPrice, as well as a copyWith method for creating modified copies.

classes.name: Product
classes.description: An immutable data model representing a product with properties such as id, name, sku, stock, and unit price.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Product instance with optional modified fields.
